Message.Title: Any/all dell bidders better think twice if they think shareholders will take less just because
Message.Msg: pc sales are falling off a cliff.That annoying fact means nothing.

Topic.Title: So what price will Icahn make his hostile bid???

Message.Msg: If only news can leak out that pc sales in Q2 have plummeted even further that may spur him to bid even higher.

Topic.Title: So what price will Icahn make his hostile bid???

Message.Msg: Afterall are not companies with plummeting sales in high demand?

Message.Title: Accept it.With plummeting pc sales dell is damaged goods.
Message.Msg: These dell shareholders remind me of these people that hold these garage sales and expect to get paid a premium for their worthless junk.

Message.Title: Icahn is nothing but a selfserving price manipulator.
Message.Msg: He has no intention of making a bid himself.It was just a ploy he had floated to try to get the other bids higher for obvious selfserving reasons.Now that it is known that pc sales are much weaker than expected Mike may even lower his bid once all the other bidders say "no thanks".

Topic.Title: Icahn is nothing but a selfserving price manipulator.

Message.Msg: What kind of a fool would be willing to pay a premium for any company that has sales falling off a cliff?

Topic.Title: Icahn is nothing but a selfserving price manipulator.

Message.Msg: Even Icahn was likely shocked at the drop off of pc sales.Now that he got himself caught with his pants down he will be looking for the most advantageous exit for himself.

Message.Title: Don't understand why more bidders haven't surfaced??
Message.Msg: Doesn't everybody want a company with sales falling off a cliff??

Topic.Title: Don't understand why more bidders haven't surfaced??

Message.Title: dell needs to lay off half its staff

Topic.Title: Don't understand why more bidders haven't surfaced??

Message.Msg: its like selling a desk top computer to a group of teenagers......all bidders want ipads and samsungs

Message.Title: 15 !!!!!!! glad I didnt sell
Message.Msg: my issue of DC cominc 15 when I was 15
